name: Punpkin Loops
description:
Can you escape from the loop?
You have to complete the level 3 times.
Be careful! Every time will be a bit harder!And there is a playbar chasing you
Can you make it?

Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • SPACE:Jump

Team:

  • Leandro Cuello - Programing (itch.io|twitter)
  • Paula Rojas - art(itch.io|instagram)
  • Franco Ortiz - music
  • Francisco Maldonado - FX
